::Zardus::

"Excellent. Now all that is needed is the equipment. As soon as this 
battle is over..."

He fires another glob of plasma energy at Koj.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Squizzy::
> 
> She stopped shooting and looked at Zardus. "You want me to clone a 
> bot?"  She looked at the ground for a moment then back up at 
> Zardus. "Yes, I suppose I can." She thought about the proceedure 
and 
> what equipment she might need. "Yes, I will be able to do this for 
> you."
